select tbM.STRMEMBERID AS strMemberid, tbM.STRREALNAME AS strRealname, tbM.STRIDCARD AS strIdcard, tbM.STRMOBILE AS strMobile, tbM.INTAGE AS intAge, tbM.STRMEMBERCARDNUM AS strMembercardnum, tbM.STRLEVELSID AS strLevelsid, tbM.INTSEX AS intSex, tbM.INTSTATUS AS intStatus, tbM.INTINTEGRAL AS intIntegral, tbM.DBALANCE AS dBalance, tbM.DAFTERSTOREDBALANCE as dAfterStoredBalance, tbML.STRLEVELSNAME as strLevelsname FROM tb_member as tbM,tb_member_levels as tbML
tbM.STRLEVELSID=tbML.strLevelsId and tbM.INTSTATUS=1 and

select strOrderId, strOrderNum, strMemberId, strMemberCardNumber, strMemberName, strLevelsId, strProductServiceId, strProductServiceName, iPurchaseType, iPurchaseAmount, strUnitName, dPrice, dPurchaseCashTotalAmount, dPreferentialPrice, dPreferentialCashTotalAmount, iStatus, iPayStandard, strPayTime, iPayType, strThirdPartyTradeFlow, strExpressNumber, strExpressCompany, strComment, strEmployeeId, strEmployeeName, strEmployeeRealName, strCreationTime, strLastAccessedTime from tb_orderDetail_info where iPurchaseType=#{iPurchaseType} and strMemberId=#{strMemberId} and strProductServiceId=#{strProductServiceId} and strLevelsId=#{strLevelsId}
